bug.author: tejasvi
bug.description:
Quoting <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/issues/2308>#2308</denchmark-link> ,
Azure tests have been failing, namely those around value tests of test_file.h5
mlpack/src/mlpack/tests/load_save_test.cpp
Line 867 in 295398e
BOOST_REQUIRE(data::Load("test_file.h5", test) == true);
and
mlpack/src/mlpack/tests/load_save_test.cpp
Line 813 in 295398e
BOOST_REQUIRE(data::Load("test_file.h5", test) == true);
I'm reporting this so, at least, it's a known issue rather than a thing each new PR needs a disclaimer about.
<denchmark-link:https://dev.azure.com/mlpack/mlpack/_build/results?buildId=1142&view=logs&j=1b38ea94-fede-5667-20eb-44d3de1ec085&t=72087b03-c17c-5a26-b713-236d9bb6c096&l=142>https://dev.azure.com/mlpack/mlpack/_build/results?buildId=1142&view=logs&j=1b38ea94-fede-5667-20eb-44d3de1ec085&t=72087b03-c17c-5a26-b713-236d9bb6c096&l=142</denchmark-link>
